alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 05 at 3:56PM AKDT until June 05 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE MATANUSKA VALLEY... * Winds...Southeast 10 to 15 mph with gusts to 25 mph. Gusts up to 30 mph possible along the Knik River Valley. * Timing...Until 9 PM this evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 22 percent. * Temperatures...In the lower to mid 70s. * Location...Palmer and areas along the Knik River. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
